root.name: American Pickers: The Road Less Traveled
root.description: OverviewAmerican Pickers: The Road Less Traveled is a hidden objects game developed and published by Big Fish Games for the PC and Mac platforms.System RequirementsPCOS: Windows XP/Vista/Win7/8CPU: 1.0 GHzRAM: 512 MBDirectX: 8.0Hard Drive: 84 MBMACOS: 10.7/10.6/10.5/10.4.11/10.4CPU: 800 Mhz (INTEL ONLY)RAM: 256 MBHard Drive: 84 MB
